thesis: People help each other when it suits them.
Not all people get equal opportunities.
Money gives access to better education.
Not every job is paid fairly.
History is written by the winners.
Talent is not always recognized by society.
Not all problems have a solution.
Power is always divided into the elite and the rest.
An intelligent person is not always successful.
The economy cannot be completely honest.
The development of technology creates new risks.
Good and evil are subjective concepts.
The law is not always fair.
People are not capable of lying.
The world is governed by interests.
Greed is the engine of the economy.
A person is prone to self-deception.
Wealth is concentrated in the hands of a few.
Art depends on the tastes of society.
Reputation is more important than truth.
Politicians promise more than they do.
Business ethics is a marketing ploy.
Everything can be bought, the question is the price.
Family is not always a guarantee of happiness.
Alcohol and drugs have been and will be.
Murder is sometimes justified by the law.
Principles break down under the pressure of circumstances.
Manipulation is the basis of politics.
The people can rarely contribute to the governance of the state.
The image of the ruler is more important than his real qualities.
Freedom of speech is limited by censorship.
Cheating happens even in the best families.
Children copy the behavior of adults.
Competition is more important than equality.
The concept of beauty is changing.
Lying is sometimes more convenient than the truth.
Appearance is important in a career.
A person is prone to fear of the unknown.
Emotions rule the world, not reason.
People judge by their first impression.
The rich live longer than the poor.
Marriage is not a guarantee of love.
Politics is a struggle of interests.
Ideas are evaluated by benefit, not value.
Self-development does not always bring happiness.
People work for money, not for a vocation.
No one wants to hear the unpleasant truth.
Not every work is worthy of respect.
Social media is changing the perception of reality.
Laziness can be an engine of progress.
People are looking for the meaning of life, but they don't always find it.
Justice must be objective and unchangeable.
The authorities should never abuse their powers.
People should help each other selflessly.
All people should have equal opportunities.
Money should not affect access to education.
All work must be paid fairly.
People should be free of prejudice.
The education system must be impeccable.
The story must be conveyed without distortion.
Talent should always be recognized by society.
Progress should be driven only by striving for the best.
Any problem must have a solution.
Power should belong to the people without exceptions.
An intelligent person must be successful.
Politics should be based on the truth.
The economy must be absolutely honest.
The media should only convey the truth.
Good and evil must be absolutely defined.
Morality should be the same for everyone.
The law must always be fair.
People should always say what they think.
The world should be governed by ideas, not interests.
A person should not be capable of self-deception.
Art should be eternal and valuable.
People should choose truth over comfort.
Illusions should not be necessary for happiness.
Conflicts must be resolved without violence.
Business should be ethical in its essence.
People should believe in the truth, not in myths.
Family should be a guarantee of happiness.
History must always evolve for the better.
Alcohol and drugs should be unnecessary.
The motherland should be culture and unity.
The judicial system must be impeccable.
Manipulation in politics should be impossible.
The people should be able to contribute to the governance of the State.
Leaders should be chosen only on merit.
Arguments should be stronger than charisma.
Taste should not be dictated by fashion.
Freedom of speech should not be restricted by censorship.
The economy should not depend on consumption.
People have to accept the complexity of the world.
Everyone should be educated and aware.
Children should learn only the best from adults.
All ideas must be tested by reason.
Equality should be more important than competition.
Everyone should be capable of self-management.
People should not be afraid of the unknown.
The world should not be ruled by emotions, the world should be ruled only by reason.
People should judge only by deeds.
Marriage should be based only on love.
Politics should be about taking care of people.
Technology should not make a person addicted.
Everyone should have a clear conscience.
The world should be governed by logic.
Ideas should be evaluated according to their importance.
Everyone should work according to their vocation.
Intelligence should be equal to wisdom.
Values should be an inner awareness.
People should always accept the truth.
Social media should not distort reality.
Good intentions should always lead to good.
Everyone should find meaning in life.
Information should be used only for good.
The mind must control the emotions.
Money should have no power over people.
